title: ANF recovers over 186 kg drugs in 7 operations
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 15 (APP):Anti-Narcotics Force (ANF) while conducting 7 operations across the country against drug traffickers managed to recover over 186 kg drugs worth more than Rs 72.8 million and arrested 6 accused.
According to an ANF Headquarters spokesperson, in an operation at Jinnah International Airport, Karachi, 4.3 kg ice was recovered from a parcel booked for Australia.
In another operation, ANF recovered 380 grams Ice from a parcel at a courier office in Lahore.
The spokesperson further informed that in an operation at Faizabad Bus Terminal, Islamabad, 23 kg ice & 1000 grams suspicious material were recovered from the possession of an accused.
ANF Peshawar conducted a raid near Ring Road, Peshawar and recovered 19.2 kg hashish from the possession of two suspects rounded up during the operation.
In 5th operation near Ring Road, Peshawar, 5 kg heroin was recovered from the possession of two motorcyclists.
In another operation near Ring Road, Peshawar, 8.4 kg hashish was recovered from the bag of a drug trafficker.
At a company warehouse in Hawksbay Road, Karachi, 105 kg ice & 20 kg heroin concealed inside machinery stored in two containers were confiscated.
Separate cases have been registered against the accused under the CNS Act.
